show_name: Case Closed: The Phantom of Baker Street (movie 6)
other_title: Detective Conan: Il fantasma di Baker Street (Italian)
Detective Conan: The Phantom of Baker Street
Detektiv Conan: Das Phantom der Baker Street (German)
El detectiu Conan: El fantasma de Baker Street (Spanish)
Meitantei Conan: Baker Street no Bōrei (Japanese)
名偵探柯南 貝克街的亡靈 (Chinese (Taiwan))
名探偵コナン ベイカー街（ストリート）の亡霊 (Japanese)
plot: Conan was invited to a party with many other guests. They were there to test a new virtual game system, when a murder mystery occured. Now Conan must go into the game system to figure out who the murderer is with the help of the famous book character Sherlock Holmes. The lives of 49 kids testing the game are in his hands.
